summary: A test module that verifies the MONAI ToNumpy transform correctly converts a wide range of input types—including PyTorch tensors, NumPy arrays, sequences, dictionaries, and CuPy arrays, both on CPU and GPU—into NumPy ndarrays.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable data type conversion for medical imaging workflows, ensuring that downstream algorithms receive consistent NumPy arrays regardless of the original tensor or array format or device placement.
